        "mode": "slice",

          "op": "query",

            "type": "logical",
            "op": "and",

                "type": "comparison",
                "field": "order_date",
                "op": ">=",
                "value": "2022-03-01"

                "field": "order_date",
                "op": "<=",
                "value": "2022-03-31"

            ]
